title: Why is Halloween Important?
content: Halloween is important because of the rich history and culture people from Ireland and the Continental US have developed.

title: Who is Annie Brackett?
content: Annie was the friend of Laurie Strode in the 1978 Halloween movie. She was murdered by Michael Myers on Halloween night.

title: How Did Laurie Survive Halloween Night?
content: Laurie stabbed Michael in the eye with the end of a wire hanger, and when Dr. Loomis finds her he unloads 6 rounds into Michael whereafter he falls off the balcony, yet somehow escapes.
